column2: GP Strategies Corp. provides training, e-Learning solutions, management consulting and engineering services. The company is headquartered in Columbia, Maryland and currently employs 4,689 full-time employees. The firm serves the manufacturing, process and energy industries, and other commercial and government sectors. The company operates through two reportable business segments: Workforce Excellence and Business Transformation Services. The Workforce Excellence segment advises and partners with organizations in designing, implementing, operating and supporting their talent management and workforce strategies. The Workforce Excellence Segment consists of two practices: managed learning services and engineering and technical services. The Business Transformation Services segment works with organizations to execute business strategies by linking business systems, process and peopleâ€™s performance to measurable results. The Business Transformation Services segment consists of two practices: sales enablement and organizational development.
70 Corporate Center, 11000 Broken Land Parkway, Suite 200
